name: Ceosmw
body: **CeosMW** is a package of Lazarus/FPC components for communication using JSON, with option of using JSONRPC 2.0 protocol (http://www.jsonrpc.org). This implements a client and server layers to an n-tier solution. **TCeosServer** - Server component to process JSONRPC requests. Compatible with all programming languages that implement JSONRPC. **TCeosClient** - Component client that makes calls according to the server implementations. How install https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZw51zr9OUk Server Demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dZAcx66-t3w Client Demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jfKfoqRxE6E Ajax client Demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKnOD8D3UAA Wiki https://github.com/jbsolucoes/ceosmw/wiki This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. Thanks for Silvio Clecio (Brook Framework), Marcos Douglas (Greyhound) and Lazarus/FPC brazilian community for inspiration! Jose Benedito - josebenedito@gmail.com - www.jbsolucoes.net
